class.name: anywheresoftware.b4a.objects.preferenceactivity.PreferenceManager
class.comment: Provides access to the saved settings. Using PreferenceManager you can get the stored values and modify them.

method.name: GetAll
method.comment: Returns a Map with all the Keys and Values. Note that changes to this map will not affect the stored values.

method.name: GetUpdatedKeys
method.comment: Returns a list with the keys that were updated since the last call to GetUpdatedKeys. Note that the updated keys may include keys with unchanged values.

method.name: GetString
method.comment: Returns the String value mapped to the given key. Returns an empty string if the key is not found.

method.name: SetBoolean
method.comment: Maps the given key to the given Boolean value.

method.name: ClearAll
method.comment: Clears all stored entries.

method.name: SetString
method.comment: Maps the given key to the given String value.

method.name: GetBoolean
method.comment: Returns the Boolean value mapped to the given key. Returns False is the key is not found.

method.name: AddEditText
method.comment: Adds a preference entry which allows the user to enter free text. Key - The preference key associated with the value. Title - Entry title. Summary - Entry summary (second row). DefaultValue - The default value of this preference entry if the key does not already exist.

method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initializes the object and sets the title that will show. The summary will show for secondary PreferenceScreens.

method.name: AddPreferenceCategory
method.comment: Adds a PreferenceCategory. A preference category is made of a title and a group of entries. Note that a PreferenceCategory cannot hold other PreferenceCategories.

method.name: AddCheckBox
method.comment: Adds a preference entry with a check box. The entry values can be either True or False. Key - The preference key associated with the value. Title - Entry title. Summary - Entry summary (second row). DefaultValue - The default value of this preference entry if the key does not already exist.

method.name: AddPreferenceScreen
method.comment: Adds a secondary PreferenceScreen. When the user presses on this entry the second screen will appear.

method.name: AddList
method.comment: Adds a preference entry which allows the user to choose a single item out of a list. Key - The preference key associated with the value. Title - Entry title. Summary - Entry summary (second row). DefaultValue - The default value of this preference entry if the key does not already exist. Should match one of the values. Values - A list of strings with the possible values.

method.name: CreateIntent
method.comment: Creates the Intent object that is required for showing the PreferencesActivity. Example:StartActivity(PreferenceScreen1.CreateIntent)

class.name: anywheresoftware.b4a.objects.preferenceactivity.PreferenceCategoryWrapper
class.comment: PreferenceCategory holds a group of other preferences.

method.name: AddEditText
method.comment: Adds a preference entry which allows the user to enter free text. Key - The preference key associated with the value. Title - Entry title. Summary - Entry summary (second row). DefaultValue - The default value of this preference entry if the key does not already exist.

method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initializes the object and sets the category title.

method.name: AddPreferenceCategory
method.comment: Adds a PreferenceCategory. A preference category is made of a title and a group of entries. Note that a PreferenceCategory cannot hold other PreferenceCategories.

method.name: AddCheckBox
method.comment: Adds a preference entry with a check box. The entry values can be either True or False. Key - The preference key associated with the value. Title - Entry title. Summary - Entry summary (second row). DefaultValue - The default value of this preference entry if the key does not already exist.

method.name: AddPreferenceScreen
method.comment: Adds a secondary PreferenceScreen. When the user presses on this entry the second screen will appear.

method.name: AddList
method.comment: Adds a preference entry which allows the user to choose a single item out of a list. Key - The preference key associated with the value. Title - Entry title. Summary - Entry summary (second row). DefaultValue - The default value of this preference entry if the key does not already exist. Should match one of the values. Values - A list of strings with the possible values.

method.name: CreateIntent
method.comment: Creates the Intent object that is required for showing the PreferencesActivity. Example:StartActivity(PreferenceScreen1.CreateIntent)

root.comment: PreferenceActivity library allows you to show the standard settings interface and provides an easy way to handle applications settings. This library requires you to modify AndroidManifest.xml. See the <link>tutorial|http://www.basic4ppc.com/forum/basic4android-getting-started-tutorials/10608-preferenceactivity-tutorial.html</link> for more information.
